thread.title: Emily Ratajkowski and Priyanka Chopra Go Inside the Golden Globes for the First Time Ever
thread.title_full: Emily Ratajkowski and Priyanka Chopra Go Inside the Golden Globes for the First Time Ever

author: Edward Barsamian
title: Emily Ratajkowski and Priyanka Chopra Go Inside the Golden Globes for the First Time Ever
text:
Emily Ratajkowski and Priyanka Chopra Go Inside the Golden Globes for the First Time Ever January 10, 2017 9:43 pm by Edward Barsamian 

For Golden Globe Awards first-timers Priyanka Chopra and Emily Ratajkowski, the big night was all about being themselves and having fun. The Indian actress made her grand entrance on the red carpet in a gilded one-of-a-kind   with Lorraine Schwartzâ€™s impressive diamond drop necklace, before taking to the stage to present the award for Best Male Actor in a Television Drama. 
Also keeping things fresh and festive was model Ratajkowski, who made her debut in a sparkling Reem Acra dress with diamond-like crystal embellishments. See these gorgeous award-show newbies go from the ceremony to the after-party in the video above.
